abstracts.cdata!:
The project is intended to strengthen
            the capacity of DME to administer the hydrocarbon sector and
            promote the development of additional petroleum fields in
            the Coastal Basin and exploration of other sedimentary
            basins.  The project includes: (a) a technical assistance
            component to strengthen DME's technical capability to
            administer the hydrocarbon sector and to arrange for the
            timely development of new fields; and (b) an exploration
            promotion component aimed at establishing the basic
            information necessary to promote new areas for exploration.
            The project would support GOZ's efforts to strengthen
            the administration of the hydrocarbon sector and to increase
            production in the Coastal Basin which would help generate
            additional export earnings and tax revenues.  The project
            would also promote other prospective areas for exploration
            by oil companies.
